source.name: Question1
source.instructions: Explain the steps you took in decrypting the message from your partner.

source.name: Question2
source.instructions: What information did you need from your partner? How did you obtain it? Was it a good (secure) way to obtain the information? Explain.

source.name: Reflection - challenging
source.instructions: What was the most challenging part of this activity?

source.name: Reflection- enjoyable
source.instructions: What was the most enjoyable part of this activity?

source.name: Reflection - understanding
source.instructions: Do you think you have a good understanding of how public key encryption/decryption works as a result of this activity? Why or why not?
